buffs.name: Healing Way
buffs.description:
Your Healing Wave spells have a ${chance}% chance to increase the effect of subsequent Healing Wave spells on that target by ${effect}% for 15 sec. This effect will stack up to 3 times.

Adding this will add 3 stacks.

buffs.name: Improved Chain Heal
buffs.description:
Increases the amount healed by Chain Heal to targets beyond the first by ${effect}%.

This adds the 3 piece set bonus from The Ten Storms.

buffs.name: Stormcaller Chain Heal Bonus
buffs.description:
-${effect} seconds on the casting time of your Chain Heal spell.

This adds the 5 piece set bonus from Stormcallers Garb.
